column1:
Overall Negative Sentiment Percentages: 

Cleanliness: 0% 
Amenities: 26.97% 
Location: 0% 
Services: 20.16% 
General: 0% 
Value: 22.80%

Suggestions to improve: 

Cleanliness: Increase the focus on keeping areas clean and take steps to ensure standards of hygiene are met.

Amenities: Consider providing more amenities to improve the customer experience and show appreciation for their patronage.

Location: Highlight the convenience and benefits of the location to increase the positive sentiment towards it. 

Services: Invest in training programs to ensure staff provides quality customer service and meets customer expectations.

General: Focus on improving overall brand image by investing in advertising and marketing strategies. 

Value: Implement strategies to increase value for customers, such as discounts and promotions.
